## **Content Covered:**
1. Levene Test
1. lm(), glm()
1. Anova

1. Welch Anova, using oneway.test()
1. Robust Anova, using
   1. t1way()
   1. med1way()
   1. t1waybt()
1. Contrasts
1. Planned Comparison, using various Contrasts
1. Trend analysis , using contrasts
1. Post-hoc tests, using
   1. pairwise.t.test()
   1. glht()
   
1. Robust Posthoc test, using
   1. lincon()
   1. mcppb20()
   
1. Effect Size , 
   1. R Squared (eta-squared)
   1. omega squared
   1. using mes(), for differnt pair of groups
   1. effect size of contrasts
